attributes.action: scrap the Council Workers fining smokers in public places
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a crazy idea-what a waste of money (around 24.5 million) No Smoking signs have always worked it is just more money for the treasury. While kids are being gunned down once again priorities lie with money making schemes on non important issues. Please help from stopping the Government from wasting more money!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
